## ğŸš€ How to Use These Images

### Running the Control Plane

```bash
docker run -d -p 3000:3000 \
  --name nodeai-control-plane \
  nodeai-hub/control-plane:amd64-latest
```

### Running the Agent Runtime

```bash
docker run -d \
  --name nodeai-agent-runtime \
  nodeai-hub/agent-runtime:amd64-latest
```

### Pull/Push to Registry

```bash
# Tag for registry
docker tag nodeai-hub/control-plane:amd64-latest ghcr.io/oxdev6/nodeai-control-plane:amd64-latest
docker tag nodeai-hub/agent-runtime:amd64-latest ghcr.io/oxdev6/nodeai-agent-runtime:amd64-latest

# Push to GitHub Container Registry
docker push ghcr.io/oxdev6/nodeai-control-plane:amd64-latest
docker push ghcr.io/oxdev6/nodeai-agent-runtime:amd64-latest
```
